popover.secondary: Points in Path of the Hunter grants Strength and Weaponskill to your Lion.

popover.primary: A mastery path focused on your pet distracting enemies while you deal damage
popover.secondary: Points in Path of the Axeman grants Toughness and Initiative to your Lion.

popover.primary: A mastery path focused on assisting and supporting your pet while he deals damage
popover.secondary: Points in the Guardian Tree grants Wounds, Toughness, Weaponskill, Strength and Initiative to you Lion.

data.name: Aethyric Insight
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters, and take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Aethyric Pandemonium
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters.

data.name: Aethyric Ward
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters, and take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Apotheosis of Flesh
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters.

data.name: Apotheosis of Mind
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Apotheosis of Spirit
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Axe Toss
data.description: You fling a throwing axe at your target, dealing 97 damage.

data.name: Baited Trap
data.description: Baiting Strike will now also increase your chance to disrupt spells by 10% for 15 seconds, and increase your armor by 618.

data.name: Baiting Strike
data.description: An attack which momentarily distracts your enemy, dealing 134 damage to them. Your targeted groupmate, or your War Lion if you do not have one, will cause 25% less hatred in all enemy monsters for 5 seconds.

data.name: Bend the Winds
data.description: Increases your Elemental resistance by 252.

data.name: Benediction of Morr
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters.

data.name: Benediction of the Dead
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters, and take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Benediction of Winters
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters, and take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Blade And Claw
data.description: Deals 800 damage to all enemies within 30 feet of both you and your War Lion.

data.name: Blindside
data.note: Must be at your target's side or rear
data.description: You attack your enemy at a vulnerable spot, dealing 104 damage immediately and inflicting them with an Ailment which deals an additional 225 damage over 9 seconds.

data.name: Blindsided!
data.description: Blindside will now also disorient your victim for 10 seconds, causing all of their abilities to take an additional 50% to build up.

data.name: Boon of Persistence
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Boon of Tenacity
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Boon of the Impalpable
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Broad Swings
data.description: All of your attacks for the next 10 seconds will strike up to 2 additional enemies within 25 feet in front of you.

data.name: Brutal Pounce
data.note:
Requires an active pet
Requires 9 points in Path of The Guardian
data.description: You command your pet to attack without mercy! Your War Lion's next attack within 20 seconds will deal an additional 209 damage and will knock down its victim for 3 seconds.

data.name: Brute Force
data.description: Increases your Strength by 160.

data.name: Bypass Defenses
data.description: You bolster yourself for 10 seconds, allowing you to bypass the defenses of an enemy keep's postern door, porting you inside.

data.name: Call War Lion
data.description:
You call your tamed War Lion to come forth and fight with you.
You may only have a single War Lion at a time.

data.name: Calming Presence
data.description: Any time you are healed, your War Lion will become healed for 25% of the value as long as it is within 30 feet.

data.name: Centuries of Training
data.description: Upon striking a target with a direct damage ability there is a 25% chance to inflict an additional 252 Spirit damage over 3 seconds.

data.name: Charge!
data.description: You and your War Lion charge into the thick of battle, increasing your movement speed by 50 for 7 seconds. If you or your War Lion use any abilities, this effect will immediately end.

data.name: Cleave Limb
data.description: A sundering blow which deals 134 damage and inflicts your victim with an Ailment which reduces their movement speed by 40% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Close Bond
data.description: You gain an additional 50 Morale every 5 seconds as long as you have an active War Lion. If your War Lion ever dies, however, you will lose 600 Morale.

data.name: Confusing Movements
data.description: Concentrating on your perceived movements, you will be able to Dodge and Parry all attacks against you for 7 seconds.

data.name: Coordinated Strike
data.description: You and your War Lion attack as a pack, ravaging your enemies. You strike your target for 109 damage, and your pet strikes its target for 109 damage. If you are within 35 feet of your pet's target, you will also strike that enemy for 109 damage, and likewise, if your pet is within 35 feet of your target, it will also strike your enemy for 109 damage as well.

data.name: Cull The Weak
data.note:
Target must be below 50% health
Requires 9 points in Path of The Axeman
data.description: A ruthless attack which deals 309 damage and will almost always deal critical damage to a wounded foe.

data.name: Cunning Assault
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%.

data.name: Cunning Evasion
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%.

data.name: Cunning Stratagem
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Discerning Offense
data.description: Your attacks have a 10% reduced chance to be defended against.

data.name: Dominance
data.description: Deals 1800 damage to your target, and heals you for 50% of the damage done.

data.name: Echoing Roar
data.description: You and your War Lion each unleash a blasting shout, interrupting any enemies within 15 feet of either one of you and inflicting an Ailment which causes 390 Spirit damage over 15 seconds to all affected enemies.

data.name: Ensnare
data.description: Deals 900 damage to your target, and roots them in place for 10 seconds.

data.name: Faultfinder
data.description: Increases friendly ram damage by 2% for the next 10 seconds.

data.name: Favour of the Gods
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%, and you take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Favour of the Mad
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%, and you take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Favour the Daemonic
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%.

data.name: Feline Grace
data.description: Your training and Elven grace allows you to remove all roots and snares from yourself and your War Lion. For the next 10 seconds, roots and snares will have no effect on you or your War Lion.

data.name: Fetch!
data.description: You command your War Lion to toss its target through the air, knocking them closer to you.

data.name: Fey Illusion
data.description: You invoke a minor bit of Elven power and attack your target with a befuddling strike, dealing 209 damage. The enemies attack speed is reduced by 20% for the next 10 seconds. Enemy monsters will become confused and will believe that your selected groupmate, or your War Lion if you do not have one, struck the blow.

data.name: Flanking
data.description: All of your attacks deal 15% more damage when you strike an enemy from the sides or rear.

data.name: Flashing Claws
data.description: Increases the chance to parry attacks by 10% for both you and your pet, as long as you have a pet active.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Flying Axe
data.description: Deals 1197 damage over 9 seconds to all enemies in front of you, up to 65 feet away.

data.name: Force of Will
data.description: You stare down your opponent, draining 200 of their Action Points into yourself, and reducing their Strength by 160 for 30 seconds.

data.name: Force Opportunity
data.description: You strike at your enemy with a brutal attack which causes 184 damage and can not be defended against. The victim's armor is reduced by 1000 for the next 10 seconds.

data.name: Frenzied Slaughter
data.description: All of your abilities will cost 25% fewer action points, cool down 50% faster, and deal 20% more damage for 7 seconds.

data.name: Full-Grown
data.description: Increases your Strength by 50, and increases your War Lion's Wounds by 100.

data.name: Furious Mending
data.description: Trained To Kill now restores 80 health to you and your War Lion every 5 seconds.

data.name: Hack
data.description: A brutal chop at your enemy which deals 134 damage.

data.name: Hack And Slash
data.description: Reduces the action point costs of Slashing Blade and Hack by 50%.

data.name: Harrier's Ken
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you, and you take 5% less damage from them. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Harrier's Pelt
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you, and you take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Harrier's Savagery
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Jagged Edge
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy they will begin to bleed, suffering additional 606 Corporeal damage over 9 seconds.

data.name: Joy of the Hunt
data.description: Your War Lion is fully healed, and all group members within 100 feet instantly gain 250 Action Points.

data.name: Leonine Frenzy
data.note:
Requires an active pet
Requires 13 points in Path of The Guardian
data.description:
At your command, your War Lion goes berserk with a killing frenzy! All root, snare, and stun effects are removed from your pet, and it becomes immune to them for the next 10 seconds. During this time, your pet will deal an additional 159 damage every time it strikes an enemy.
Damage can only trigger once every second.

data.name: Lionheart
data.description: Lion's Fury no longer requires that the target be Cursed, costs 15 fewer action points, and deals 309 Spirit damage.

data.name: Lion's Fury
data.description: You draw upon your mystical Elven heritage and furiously attack your target, dealing 184 Spirit damage.

data.name: Loner
data.description: You deal 25% more damage when your War Lion is not called forth.

data.name: Nature's Bond
data.description: Your War Lion regains 785 health over 15 seconds.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Clever
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Cunning
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Dim
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Pack Assault
data.description: A feral attack which deals 159 damage and inspires your groupmates to hunt as a pack. Within the next 5 seconds, each group member within 100 feet will deal an additional 100 damage with their next attack.

data.name: Pack Hunting
data.description: Trained To Hunt will now also increase your autoattack speed by 50%.

data.name: Pack Synergy
data.description: Increases the additional damage dealt when either you or your pet critically hits by 50%, as long as you have a pet active.

data.name: Pounce
data.note:
You cannot use this ability while airborne
You cannot perform this action while rooted
You cannot perform this action while stunned
Requires 5 points in Path of The Hunter
data.description: You pounce forwards, leaping towards your target. When you land, you will inflict 159 damage, and your movement speed will be increased by 35% for 3 seconds.

data.name: Primal Fury
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will deal 25% more damage any time you strike an enemy in the sides or back.

data.name: Rampage
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, all of your abilities will cool down immediately and not cost any action points. This will also affect your War Lion as well.

data.name: Relentless Assault
data.description: A prolonged fervor that grants 10 Action Points a second to everyone in your group within 100 feet of you for 10 seconds.

data.name: Revenge!
data.description: If your War Lion is killed, you will go into a rage and deal 50% more damage for 10 seconds.

data.name: Riposte
data.description: Each time you parry an enemy's attack, you will strike them back for 246 damage which they can not prevent.

data.name: Sever Nerve
data.description: A directed strike that inflicts 1200 damage to your target.

data.name: Shattering Blow
data.description: A powerful attack which shatters your enemy's bones, inflicting a Curse which deals 285 damage over 9 seconds. If you attack an enemy from the sides or back, then you will also reduce their Strength by 75 for 9 seconds.

data.name: Siege Wrecker
data.note: Not usable on Siege Rams or Oil
data.description: You sabotage a siege ram, causing the ram to deal 98% of the original damage for the next 10 seconds.

data.name: Sky Titan's Bulwark
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%.

data.name: Sky Titan's Favor
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%.

data.name: Sky Titan's Strength
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Slashing Blade
data.description: A broad sweep of your axe which deals 134 damage to all enemies in front of you, up to 25 feet away.

data.name: Speed Training
data.description: Increases your War Lion's movement speed by 50%.

data.name: Stalker
data.description: Increases your War Lion's Strength and Toughness and causes 75% less hatred in hostile monsters.

data.name: Submission
data.description:
You cower submissively, causing all enemies within 30 feet to hate you less and deal only 50% damage to you for 5 seconds. For the next 5 seconds, you will cause 25% less hate in all enemy monsters.
If you attack anyone that you've Detaunted, the effect will immediately fade from them.

data.name: Sundering Chop
data.description: A powerful axe chop which deals 159 damage. If you are behind the enemy, then this attack will ignore 618 armor.

data.name: Tearing Blade
data.description: Slashing Blade and Sundering Chop will now cause an additional 258 damage over 3 seconds.

data.name: Thin The Herd
data.note:
Must be at your target's side or rear
Requires 13 points in Path of The Axeman
data.description: You call forth a small bit of power as you attack your enemy, dealing 184 damage and causing all healing that they use within the next 10 seconds to become 50% as effective.

data.name: Threatening Distraction
data.description: Trained To Threaten will now reduce all hatred that you cause in hostile monsters by 75%.

data.name: Throat Bite
data.description: You command your pet to go for the throat! Your War Lion's next attack within 20 seconds will deal an additional 159 damage and will Silence its victim, making them unable to use magic for 4 seconds.

data.name: Trained To Hunt
data.description:
You train your pet to hunt with you, increasing its Strength, Toughness, Wounds, and Weapon Skill by 50% of your bonus gained from items. Any time either you or your War Lion strikes an enemy, there is a 10% chance that you will deal an additional 78 damage over 3 seconds.

Your War Lion will gain the ability to bite its enemies, the ability to claw at multiple foes, and the ability to reduce several enemies' autoattack speeds.

data.name: Trained To Kill
data.description:
You train your pet to fight ferociously, increasing its Strength by your Wounds gained from items and Weapon Skill from your Toughness gained from items and increasing your Toughness by 50.

Your War Lion will gain the ability to strike its enemies with a powerful mauling attack, the ability to attack its target repeatedly, and the ability to deal damage over time.

data.name: Trained To Threaten
data.description:
You train your pet to behave menacingly, increasing its Toughness and Wounds by 50% of your Strength gained from items and increasing your chance to critically hit by 5% as long as you are at your target's sides or back.

Your War Lion will gain the ability to threaten its enemies, the ability to reduce a foe's armor, and the ability to snare its enemies.

data.name: Whirling Axe
data.description: You rapidly spin your axe around for up to 3 seconds, dealing 59 damage twice a second to all enemies within 30 feet. This ability will end if you lose your concentration or run out of action points.
